ygData.subject: Famine prepares
ygData.msgSnippet: Famine looked at his horsmen brothers. You know what you must do if it comes to this. He injected each with his needle sending the chemicals to their sparks.

Subject: Famine prepares
To: nbwrpg@egroups.com

Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

 Famine looked at his horsmen brothers. "You know what you must do if it 
comes to this." He injected each with his needle sending the chemicals to 
their sparks. "Now if the timne comes we are ready." he stabbed himself with 
the needle. "To die honorably." Apocalypse looked on disbelief.. "Fools."
